meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_film

languageKey.label: What type of film is this? A hosted film (i.e. YouTube), a film file located in fileadmin, or a URL to a film.
The item's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
Which host is used to host this film: YouTube or Vimeo? More can be added via TypoScript. Different templates will be used in the FE based on who the host is.
This film's host's id for this film.
This film's URL, this will be used to make a link to the film.
The actual film file that this film record is for. This is a reference to a film in fileadmin.
A short description of the film.
An image to be used as a preview of the film.
The date that this film should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this film should stop showing up in the FE.
